tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE game_event_schedule (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  event_date DATE NOT NULL,
  event_time TIME NOT NULL,
  notification_sent BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE
)

CREATE TABLE game_events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(100),
  event_datetime TIMESTAMP,
  event_location VARCHAR(200)
)

CREATE TABLE event_notifications (
  notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT,
  notification_message VARCHAR(255),
  notification_datetime TIMESTAMP
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES game_events(event_id)
)

CREATE TABLE GameEvents (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE,
    event_time TIME,
    event_location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE EventParticipants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255),
    participant_email VARCHAR(255),
    event_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES GameEvents(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE game_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    event_date DATE NOT NULL,
    event_time TIME NOT NULL,
    event_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE event_notifications (
   notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   event_id INT REFERENCES game_events(event_id),
   notification_message TEXT NOT NULL,
   notification_date DATE NOT NULL,
   notification_time TIME NOT NULL
);
